template.name: Template SNMP Ubiquiti AirOS
template.description: Zabbix Template for Ubiquiti AirOS v6.x.

trigger.name: AirMax Capacity < 30%
trigger.description: AirMax Capacity has dropped below 30% more than 100 times per last hour.

trigger.name: AirMax Quality < 70%
trigger.description: AirMax Quality has dropped below 70% more than 100 times per last hour.

trigger.name: Signal Strength < -90 dBm
trigger.description: Signal Strength has dropped below -90 dBm more than 100 times per last hour!

trigger.name: Transmit CCQ < 80
trigger.description: In the last hour the Transmit CCQ value was less than 80 more than 100 times.

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} Firmware out of date {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger.description: Firmware is out of date on {HOSTNAME}! Current Firmware version: {ITEM.LASTVALUE} < 6.1.3.
